OCD.name: Measurement Trigger File
OCD.description: Gateway for consumming measurements and saving them as values in files.

AD.name: Wiring group name
AD.description: Name of the group of components that will be wired together.

AD.name: Consumable scopes
AD.description: Comma delimited list of the scopes for measurements. (Use full scope names)

AD.name: File Name Pattern
AD.description: Name of file to use for output. Asterixs will be replaced by a timestamp.

AD.name: Units for outputing weight measurement values.
AD.description: Unit of measurement for outputing weights. (All other measurements types will be output without conversion.)

AD.name: Measurement Value Format
AD.description: String format to use for outputing the measurement value in the file. Variable ordering is: dateTime, unit, value, error.

AD.name: Connection uri
AD.description: Identifier referencing the output destination for measurement files. This will also associate this service with an external node in the monitor view.
